title: maNamAlai shUTTuginrEn
sahitya:
maNamAlai shUTTuginrEn en anbai un malaraDi nATTuginrEn paramAtmanE


anupallavi

  kaNamEnum urangAda kAdalilE shezhittu kaNNIrilE pUttup-paNNisai vaNDUdum


caraNam    ariyAp-paruvattil AshiyAik-kUDi en arivAgi niraivAgi Atma caitanyamAgi
pori pulan eTTAda poruLAgi aruLAna puruSOttamA unakkE pUvai rAmapriyai
